Sentencas: The effects of fuel processor faults in an solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system are analyzed.
Titulo: Reformer faults in SOFC systems: Experimental and modeling analysis, and simulated fault maps

Sentencas: Focusing on a laboratory-size SOFC system, a reformer fault is investigated both experimentally and through a model; comparison between experimental and modeling results is presented and discussed.
Titulo: Reformer faults in SOFC systems: Experimental and modeling analysis, and simulated fault maps

Sentencas: The results show that some types of reformer faults can be dangerous, because they can give rise to local thermal gradients as large as 10-20.10(2) K/m or more in the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Reformer faults in SOFC systems: Experimental and modeling analysis, and simulated fault maps

Sentencas: Simulation results show that SOFC stacks employing metallic interconnects are expected to withstand faults of larger magnitude than SOFC stacks employing ceramic interconnects.
Titulo: Reformer faults in SOFC systems: Experimental and modeling analysis, and simulated fault maps

Sentencas: Fault maps are presented and discussed, which can be the basis for the development of a fault detection and isolation (FDI) tool.
Titulo: Reformer faults in SOFC systems: Experimental and modeling analysis, and simulated fault maps
